
\documentclass{article}
\newcommand{\mathdefault}[1]{#1}
\usepackage{type1cm}
\usepackage{type1ec}
\usepackage{helvet}
\usepackage{type1ec}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{2212}{\ensuremath{-}}
\usepackage[papersize=72in,body=70in,margin=1in]{geometry}

\makeatletter\@ifpackageloaded{textcomp}{}{\usepackage{textcomp}}\makeatother
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
% The empty hbox ensures that a page is printed even for empty inputs, except
% when using psfrag which gets confused by it.
\fontsize{14.000000}{17.500000}%
\ifdefined\psfrag\else\hbox{}\fi%
{\rmfamily $\mathdefault{0.000}$}
\end{document}
